lead_paragraph: The liquor baron Vijay Mallya has agreed to give up his chairmanship and board seat at India’s top spirits company, United Spirits, ending months of conflict with the company’s new owner.

headline.print_headline: United Spirits Chairman to Quit After Internal Conflict
headline.main: United Spirits Chairman to Quit After Internal Conflict

snippet: The liquor baron Vijay Mallya has agreed to give up his chairmanship and board seat at India’s top spirits company, United Spirits, ending months of conflict with the company’s new owner.
abstract: United Spirits chairman Vijay Mallya resigns company due to conflicts with new owner Diageo.
